name: Office Combat
description:
Office Combat is game is about literally fighting a toxic work culture. Made in GB Studio, you play as a side scrolling worker who wants to leave work on time after finishing their tasks. On the way to the Boss's office, many coworkers stand in your way, and they won't let you go without a fight.

Controls

Action
Game Boy
KeyboardMoveD-PadArrow Keys
Skip Text
AZJumpBXPunchAZ

This game was made for the Game Boy Competition 2021 and is intended to be played on a Game Boy Color. The projects files are also downloadable!
